head.title: On holiday with your dog - over 11'000 pet-friendly holiday homes | Interhome
head.description: We have over 11,000 animal-friendly holiday houses and apartments. Unforgettable holidays for you and your pet.

links.label: Safe, enjoyable holidays – take a look at our holiday ideas
Take a break with your four-legged friend

content.title: Take a break with your four-legged friend

content.text:
Your pet needs a holiday too! A bit of variety and a new territory to explore is certainly better than staying home alone.

Spend your holiday with your dog at one of Interhome‘s holiday homes or apartments, because your pet is just as welcome as you are at all of our 11,000 animal-friendly holiday houses and apartments in Switzerland, France, Italy, Germany and other countries throughout Europe! Our spacious properties and large gardens provide plenty of room for you and your best friend in some of Europe’s most beautiful regions: by the sea, in the mountains and in the countryside. With Interhome, taking a holiday with your dog is no problem!

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Hand-picked and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: In-resort service and a 24/7 helpline
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and information about your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it than in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, experience the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or indulge yourself in the luxury of a Spanish Villa. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online with us - it is quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
